tests.summary: Display bonus eligibility message for 2G customer
tests.description: Verify that the system displays the correct bonus eligibility message for a 2G customer during identification.
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Display bonus eligibility for a 2G customer
  Given I am a 2G customer
  When I am identified in the system
  Then I should see the message: "Switch to 5G and get 50GO of Internet + unlimited calls to Ooredoo + 300 minutes to other networks for 30 days! Valid for one month"

tests.summary: Grant 5G bonus after successful swap for 2G customer
tests.description: Verify that the 5G bonus is automatically granted after a successful USIM swap for a 2G customer.
